content.raw:
The remaining question I have is if -1 is the default anyway, why does it need to be explicitly specified for the identify task (regardless of what mode train was previously run in)?

The confusion is arriving from the code:
```python
if self.identify:
     directives["CARD_SUPERVISIONLABEL"] = IDENTIFY_SUPERVISION
```
If this statement is re-setting a default value why is this fixing the problem?
